Title: Requires that driver's licenses indicate the blood type of the licensee upon the licensee's request; repealer
Summary: Requires that driver's licenses indicate the blood type of the licensee upon the licensee's request.
LawCode: Amd §§504 & 502, rpld §502 sub 1, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring that driver's licenses indicate the blood type of the licensee upon the licensee's request; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
